li.label: in the process of breaking through

HediffDef.label: Body Tempering
HediffDef.description: body has been tempered, muscle increased. pawn are stronger than most mortal at this stage

HediffDef.label: Marrow Cleansing
HediffDef.description: pawn marrow has been cleansed, improve inner working of pawn body.

HediffDef.label: Bone Forging
HediffDef.description: pawn bone has been forged, stronger that most mortal. the last stage for a mortal before embarking onto the path of cultivation.

HediffDef.label: Qi Gathering
HediffDef.description: the first step of cultivation, Qi has been introduced to pawn body. improve several aspect of their body. pawn lifespan increase slightly.

HediffDef.label: Foundation Establishment
HediffDef.description: formed a foundation in preparation for a core shaping stage. during this stage. pawn physique are improved

HediffDef.label: Core Shaping
HediffDef.description: forming a core inside their dantian, a very important stage for cultivator. during this stage, mortal can no longer do damage to cultivator without the help of weapon of Earth grade or above

HediffDef.label: Golden Core
HediffDef.description: the first milestone for all cultivator. the golden core stage. pawn food and rest need are capped at a minimum of 30% also the first stage where the threat of heavenly tribulation become available to cultivator.

HediffDef.label: Nascent Soul
HediffDef.description: formed a nascent soul. greatly increase in combat ability, during this stage. pawn now formed a layer of Qi barrier around them for protection

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Transcendent
HediffDef.description: transcend the lower realm of cultivation. pawn physique greatly improved. lifespan also greatly improved.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Half-Step Saint
HediffDef.description: half-step toward saint realm, the qi barrier is strengthened, and so is the combat capability

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Saint
HediffDef.description: Saint Realm, in this stage. in this stage. cultivator can no longer be harmed by mortal, no matter the mean. turret building and trap mean nothing to cultivator in this stage. even mortal with the help of extraordinary weapon wouldn't be able to harm this pawn.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Saint King
HediffDef.description: the pinnacle of saint realm. the Saint King. the enviaronment hazard no longer concern to them.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Immortal Ascension
HediffDef.description: Immortal Ascension. the second milestone for cultivator, their lifespan are 10 times as long as mortal. and their power has transcend the lower realm, capable of single-handedly destroy a faction base(assuming no cultivator of the same tier are present)

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: True Immortal
HediffDef.description: the True Immortal realm, revered by many mortal. few has manage to reach this level. those that do has commit an extraordinary deed.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Immortal Saint
HediffDef.description: the peak of Immortal stage. power/sense and Qi barrier greatly improve

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Half-Step God
HediffDef.description: half-step into godhood, pawn power almost transcend the heaven and earth.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: True God
HediffDef.description: the True God realm, pawn power transcend the heaven and earth, select few manage to reach this realm, those that do has their name spread across the universe.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Creation Realm
HediffDef.description: the final stage of cultivation where cultivator can reach. their power transcend the plain of reality. one that reach this stage are said to nearly become one with the Dao. facing against them is almost impossible. this should be the peak of cultivation, however rumor has it that there still one hidden realm beyond Creation.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.

HediffDef.label: Outside the Domain
HediffDef.description: beyond the universe, and outside the domain, their exist the First Forge. the root of all universe, said to be the true Complete Dao. only those acknowledged by the First Forge and it keeper can step outside the domain.

li.gizmoTip: A layer of protection Qi produced by cultivator of high realm.
